ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: - ADMINISTRATION INFORMATION SHEET - ESSAY ON TOPIC PROVIDED WITH APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS - SCHOOL ACTIVITES; LEADERSHIP POSITIONS; WORK EXPERIENCE - SCHOOL MUST SUBMIT AN ORIGINAL, CERTIFIED TRANSCRIPT OF GRADES
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: RECIPIENTS MUST BE CHILDREN OF RSPA MEMBER/DEALERS OR CHILDREN OF EMPLOYEES OF RSPA MEMBER/DEALERS TO BE ELIGIBLE.
